title: Faraday Tour
alt: I asked them if it was safe to be running tours during the pandemic. They said, "During the what?"
transcript:
[Close-up on Hairy]
Hairy: Hey there superfans, welcome to the livecast!
[Hairy walks toward an opening in a large building]
Hairy: Got a real treat for you today: a tour of the world's largest Faraday cage! C'mon, let's check it-
[two panels of a "loading" spinner]
[Hairy exits the building]
Hairy: -was so cool! Wow!! Thanks for coming along, and don't forget to smash that like button!
